item.description:
Want some FREE ZUMBA® with Zumba with Jess?

Join her at Fiedler's Field on the Esplanade on JUNE 17TH (FATHER'S DAY) -- class starts at 3:30 PM -- below are details on all the activities available. If you can't make it for this Sunday, save the date for the next Sunday Fun in the Park on September 9th.

---

Sunday Fun in the Park

Sunday is a day of rest, but it doesn’t mean you have to. Have a little fun! Sunday Fun in the Park is a community day promoting healthy living and sense of place. Though geared towards youth and families, there are a variety of activities for all ages, from music and fishing to yoga and arts & crafts.

All Sunday Fun in the Park activities are free and open to the public. Activities run from 2:00–4:00pm and are located at the Fiedler Field, near the Hatch Shell and the Fiedler Footbridge. Click here for directions. We hope you come out to soak up the sun and enjoy a free community day on us!

There are two Sunday Fun in the Park days this summer:

June 17th (Father’s Day)

September 9th

Schedule June 17th

2:00-4:00pm - Parkland Games with Knucklebones

We’re here to have fun so let’s play some games! Knucklebones, a recreational programming company dedicated to inspiring athletics for all ages for the love of play, will be providing a variety of games geared towards every age group. Whether you want to try hoola hooping, playing volleyball, bouncing on blow-up animals, or winning at corn hole, Knucklebones has games for all ages and welcomes you to get out there and have some fun!

2:00-4:00pm - Fishing off the Docks

Reel ‘em in! As a part of our Sunday Fun in the Park program TEA offers kids a chance to catch as many as they can off of the River Dock. Grab a rod and try your hand at nabbing a big one!

2:00-4:00pm - Arts & Crafts

Offering fun arts activities to youth of all ages. Make some thing for Dad for Father’s Day!

3:00-3:30pm – Family Fun Yoga with Bare Bones Yoga

Kids and parents alike can participate in this great program that includes yoga-inspired games and poses to encourage a healthy and active lifestyle. Karen Fabian, founder of Bare Bones Yoga, incorporates different techniques to ensure that all can take part and enjoy.

3:30-4:00pm – Zumba with Jess

Zumba® combines high energy and motivating music with unique moves and combinations that allow you to dance away your stress while you get fit. Zumba ® is based on the principle that exercise should be FUN and EASY to do. Anyone can Zumba!  It’s a “feel happy” workout that is great for your body and mind.  Join Zumba with Jess at Sunday Fun in the Park as she holds a class geared to both adults & kids alike — it will give you a nice sampling of what to expect at a Zumba® class.

group.name: Zumba® with Jess in Union Square

item.name: ZwJ on the Esplanade - FREE ZUMBA
